apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man in a steamy room emoji showcases a medium-dark skin tone with realistic lighting that catches the simulated moisture in the air, creating a sense of warmth and relaxation. The figure is depicted with smooth, rounded contours, embodying the serene experience of a sauna or steam room. This emoji on Apple devices conveys feelings of wellness, rejuvenation, and unwinding after a long day.
